item.description:
VisLies 2024 Gallery

This year, hurricanes Helene and Milton wreaked havoc on Florida where the IEEE Vis conference and hence VisLies was supposed to be. So, this year back to meeting online.

Inflated Bars

Ken Moreland started us off with this quick example. Here we see what appears to be a bar chart, but it makes not sense. First of all, the bars do not adequately reflect the values of the poll. Perhaps this was never intended to be a bar chart, but it’s layout is confusing.
